creator: Basecone N.V.
descriptionHtml:
Optimise the workflow of your digital documents in the cloud! This user-friendly app will allow pre-selected authorisers to review, approve and reject documents on the go. On top of that, the authoriser can add comments to the documents and view comments made by others.

• Real-time connection with the Basecone web application

• Authorisers do not need to be logged into the Basecone web application to review documents

• Add comments to documents and view comments made by others

• User-friendly, fast and on the go – authorising has never been that much fun!

Please note: The Basecone app can only be used in combination with the Basecone web application.
descriptionShort: Approve receipts, invoices and other documents on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Stability improvements under the hood

title: Basecone

creator: Basecone N.V.
descriptionHtml:
Optimise the workflow of your digital documents in the cloud! This user-friendly app will allow pre-selected authorisers to review, approve and reject documents on the go. On top of that, the authoriser can add comments to the documents and view comments made by others.

descriptionShort: Approve receipts, invoices and other documents on the go.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: App can now be used in French

title: Basecone

creator: Basecone N.V.
descriptionHtml:
For document authorisation:

This user-friendly app will allow pre-selected authorisers to review, approve, and reject documents on the go. Do you need more information to make a decision? Place the document On Hold.

• Receive notifications when invoices are ready for you to check
• Review, approve or reject documents
• Add comments to the document or view comments from colleagues

For uploading invoices:

Submit invoices effortlessly to Basecone. Forget lost invoices and complicated Excel spreadsheets. Submit them anywhere, anytime!

· Create documents by using your camera, gallery or cloud storage;
· Upload to Basecone with a simple swipe or use bulk mode.

The app is connected in real-time with Basecone.

Please note: The Basecone app can only be used in combination with the Basecone web application.
descriptionShort: Upload invoices and authorise documents on the go!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Upload your business invoice and send it directly to Basecone;
This version includes layout and performance improvements;
The app is now also available in Danish.

descriptionShort: Upload invoices and authorise documents on the go!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You know that invoice you receive through your e-mail? You can now share it directly with the Basecone app on your phone. Share images and PDFs from any app!

We have listened to your feedback and now we will suggest a payment method on all uploads according to your past behavior!

We tackled some bugs, so that you have a smoother experience.

Furthermore, we fixed a bug that made the app crash when you opened the PDF Preview.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
From now on you can choose to save pictures taken in the Basecone app locally on your device. This way you will not lose your pictures anymore!
Also we fixed the bug where your previously taken picture showed bottom left when taking a new picture, so no more confusion.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: With the ever evolving phone cameras and screens, images have been becoming bigger. Therefore we will now compress images so that you can continue uploading your images to Basecone without reaching the limit.

title:
Basecone
1.24.1

creator: Basecone NV
descriptionHtml:
For document authorisation:

This user-friendly app will allow pre-selected authorisers to review, approve, and reject documents on the go. Do you need more information to make a decision? Place the document On Hold.

• Receive notifications when invoices are ready for you to check
• Review, approve or reject documents
• Add comments to the document or view comments from colleagues

For uploading invoices:

Submit invoices effortlessly to Basecone. Forget lost invoices and complicated Excel spreadsheets. Submit them anywhere, anytime!

· Create documents by using your camera, gallery or cloud storage;
· Upload to Basecone with a simple swipe or use bulk mode.

The app is connected in real-time with Basecone.

Please note: The Basecone app can only be used in combination with the Basecone web application.
descriptionShort: Upload invoices and authorise documents on the go!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Please update your Basecone app to ensure that in 2025 the camera functionalities will continue to work and to ensure the new year starts well!
